Class GrowRois

  • java.lang.Object
    • GrowRois
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter

    public class GrowRois
extends java.lang.Object
implements ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter
    This ImageJ plugin allows to grow (dilate) ROIs (regions of interest) simultaneousy, optionally with additional control options Namely, avoiding overlap between neighboring ROIs and restricting the growth area to a preset mask The primary intended use is cell segmentation by using the nuclei as the starting point; in this case, pancytoplasmic marking allows to delimit the cells, while avoid overlap leads to a modified watershed that centers the cells on the nuclei.
    Author:
    Thomas Braschler, Zahra Sadat Ghazali

      Optional mask specifying the accessible pixels for ROI dilatation
      static int nPixels
      Total number of pixels by which the dilatation should be done
      static boolean overlapAllowed
      Flag indicating whether neighboring ROIs are allowed to overlap
      ij.gui.Roi[] theRois
      Array of the ROIs to be grown
